$comment: Resource Schema for AWS::Athena::WorkGroup. Any changes made to SDK model for WorkGroup should be reflected here.

Tags.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

Key.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 128  
Update requires: No interruption

Value.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 256  
Update requires: No interruption

Tag.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

SelectedEngineVersion.description: The engine version requested by the user. Possible values are determined by the output of ListEngineVersions, including Auto. The default is Auto.
SelectedEngineVersion.markdownDescription:
The engine version requested by the user. Possible values are determined by the output of ListEngineVersions, including Auto. The default is Auto.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

EffectiveEngineVersion.description: Read only. The engine version on which the query runs. If the user requests a valid engine version other than Auto, the effective engine version is the same as the engine version that the user requested. If the user requests Auto, the effective engine version is chosen by Athena. When a request to update the engine version is made by a CreateWorkGroup or UpdateWorkGroup operation, the EffectiveEngineVersion field is ignored.
EffectiveEngineVersion.markdownDescription:
Read only. The engine version on which the query runs. If the user requests a valid engine version other than Auto, the effective engine version is the same as the engine version that the user requested. If the user requests Auto, the effective engine version is chosen by Athena. When a request to update the engine version is made by a CreateWorkGroup or UpdateWorkGroup operation, the EffectiveEngineVersion field is ignored.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

EngineVersion.description: The Athena engine version for running queries.
EngineVersion.markdownDescription:
The Athena engine version for running queries.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

BytesScannedCutoffPerQuery.description: The upper data usage limit (cutoff) for the amount of bytes a single query in a workgroup is allowed to scan.
BytesScannedCutoffPerQuery.markdownDescription:
The upper data usage limit (cutoff) for the amount of bytes a single query in a workgroup is allowed to scan.

---

Required: No  
Type: Integer  
Update requires: No interruption

EnforceWorkGroupConfiguration.description: If set to "true", the settings for the workgroup override client-side settings. If set to "false", client-side settings are used
EnforceWorkGroupConfiguration.markdownDescription:
If set to "true", the settings for the workgroup override client-side settings. If set to "false", client-side settings are used

---

Required: No  
Type: Boolean  
Update requires: No interruption

PublishCloudWatchMetricsEnabled.description: Indicates that the Amazon CloudWatch metrics are enabled for the workgroup.
PublishCloudWatchMetricsEnabled.markdownDescription:
Indicates that the Amazon CloudWatch metrics are enabled for the workgroup.

---

Required: No  
Type: Boolean  
Update requires: No interruption

RequesterPaysEnabled.description: If set to true, allows members assigned to a workgroup to reference Amazon S3 Requester Pays buckets in queries. If set to false, workgroup members cannot query data from Requester Pays buckets, and queries that retrieve data from Requester Pays buckets cause an error.
RequesterPaysEnabled.markdownDescription:
If set to true, allows members assigned to a workgroup to reference Amazon S3 Requester Pays buckets in queries. If set to false, workgroup members cannot query data from Requester Pays buckets, and queries that retrieve data from Requester Pays buckets cause an error. 

---

Required: No  
Type: Boolean  
Update requires: No interruption

OutputLocation.description: The location in Amazon S3 where your query results are stored, such as s3://path/to/query/bucket/. To run the query, you must specify the query results location using one of the ways: either for individual queries using either this setting (client-side), or in the workgroup, using WorkGroupConfiguration
OutputLocation.markdownDescription:
The location in Amazon S3 where your query results are stored, such as s3://path/to/query/bucket/. To run the query, you must specify the query results location using one of the ways: either for individual queries using either this setting (client-side), or in the workgroup, using WorkGroupConfiguration

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

KmsKey.description: For SSE-KMS and CSE-KMS, this is the KMS key ARN or ID.
KmsKey.markdownDescription:
For SSE-KMS and CSE-KMS, this is the KMS key ARN or ID. 

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

EncryptionOption.description: Indicates whether Amazon S3 server-side encryption with Amazon S3-managed keys (SSE-S3), server-side encryption with KMS-managed keys (SSE-KMS), or client-side encryption with KMS-managed keys (CSE-KMS) is used.
EncryptionOption.markdownDescription:
Indicates whether Amazon S3 server-side encryption with Amazon S3-managed keys (SSE-S3), server-side encryption with KMS-managed keys (SSE-KMS), or client-side encryption with KMS-managed keys (CSE-KMS) is used.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: SSE_S3 | SSE_KMS | CSE_KMS  
Update requires: No interruption

RemoveBytesScannedCutoffPerQuery.description: Indicates that the data usage control limit per query is removed.
RemoveBytesScannedCutoffPerQuery.markdownDescription:
Indicates that the data usage control limit per query is removed.

---

Required: No  
Type: Boolean  
Update requires: No interruption

EncryptionConfiguration.description: If query results are encrypted in Amazon S3, indicates the encryption option used (for example, SSE-KMS or CSE-KMS) and key information.
EncryptionConfiguration.markdownDescription:
If query results are encrypted in Amazon S3, indicates the encryption option used (for example, SSE-KMS or CSE-KMS) and key information.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

ManagedStorageEncryptionConfiguration.description: Indicates the encryption configuration for Athena Managed Storage. If not setting this field, Managed Storage will encrypt the query results with Athena's encryption key
ManagedStorageEncryptionConfiguration.markdownDescription:
Indicates the encryption configuration for Athena Managed Storage. If not setting this field, Managed Storage will encrypt the query results with Athena's encryption key

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

RemoveEncryptionConfiguration.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: Boolean  
Update requires: No interruption

AdditionalConfiguration.description: Additional Configuration that are passed to Athena Spark Calculations running in this workgroup
AdditionalConfiguration.markdownDescription:
Additional Configuration that are passed to Athena Spark Calculations running in this workgroup

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

ExecutionRole.description: The ARN of the execution role used to access user resources for Spark sessions and Identity Center enabled workgroups. This property applies only to Spark enabled workgroups and Identity Center enabled workgroups.
ExecutionRole.markdownDescription:
The ARN of the execution role used to access user resources for Spark sessions and Identity Center enabled workgroups. This property applies only to Spark enabled workgroups and Identity Center enabled workgroups.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

RemoveOutputLocation.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: Boolean  
Update requires: No interruption

ExpectedBucketOwner.markdownDescription:
The AWS account ID of the owner of S3 bucket where query results are stored

Update requires: No interruption

RemoveExpectedBucketOwner.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: Boolean  
Update requires: No interruption

S3AclOption.description: The Amazon S3 canned ACL that Athena should specify when storing query results. Currently the only supported canned ACL is BUCKET_OWNER_FULL_CONTROL
S3AclOption.markdownDescription:
The Amazon S3 canned ACL that Athena should specify when storing query results. Currently the only supported canned ACL is BUCKET_OWNER_FULL_CONTROL

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: BUCKET_OWNER_FULL_CONTROL  
Update requires: No interruption

Indicates that an Amazon S3 canned ACL should be set to control ownership of stored query results

Indicates the KMS key for encrypting notebook content.

Update requires: No interruption

RemoveCustomerContentEncryptionConfigura.markdownDescription:

Update requires: No interruption

ResultConfiguration.description: The location in Amazon S3 where query results are stored and the encryption option, if any, used for query results. These are known as "client-side settings". If workgroup settings override client-side settings, then the query uses the workgroup settings.
ResultConfiguration.markdownDescription:
The location in Amazon S3 where query results are stored and the encryption option, if any, used for query results. These are known as "client-side settings". If workgroup settings override client-side settings, then the query uses the workgroup settings.


---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

ResultConfigurationUpdates.description: The result configuration information about the queries in this workgroup that will be updated. Includes the updated results location and an updated option for encrypting query results.
ResultConfigurationUpdates.markdownDescription:
The result configuration information about the queries in this workgroup that will be updated. Includes the updated results location and an updated option for encrypting query results.

Update requires: No interruption

Enabled.markdownDescription:

CoordinatorDpuSize.description: The number of DPUs to use for the coordinator. A coordinator is a special executor that orchestrates processing work and manages other executors in a notebook session. The default is 1.
CoordinatorDpuSize.markdownDescription:
The number of DPUs to use for the coordinator. A coordinator is a special executor that orchestrates processing work and manages other executors in a notebook session. The default is 1.

---

Required: No  
Type: Integer  
Update requires: No interruption

MaxConcurrentDpus.description: The maximum number of DPUs that can run concurrently.
MaxConcurrentDpus.markdownDescription:
The maximum number of DPUs that can run concurrently.

---

Required: No  
Type: Integer  
Update requires: No interruption

DefaultExecutorDpuSize.description: The default number of DPUs to use for executors. An executor is the smallest unit of compute that a notebook session can request from Athena. The default is 1.
DefaultExecutorDpuSize.markdownDescription:
The default number of DPUs to use for executors. An executor is the smallest unit of compute that a notebook session can request from Athena. The default is 1.

---

Required: No  
Type: Integer  
Update requires: No interruption

AdditionalConfigs.description: Contains additional notebook engine MAP<string, string> parameter mappings in the form of key-value pairs. To specify an Athena notebook that the Jupyter server will download and serve, specify a value for the StartSessionRequest$NotebookVersion field, and then add a key named NotebookId to AdditionalConfigs that has the value of the Athena notebook ID.

^.+$.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

AdditionalConfigs.markdownDescription:
Contains additional notebook engine MAP<string, string> parameter mappings in the form of key-value pairs. To specify an Athena notebook that the Jupyter server will download and serve, specify a value for the StartSessionRequest$NotebookVersion field, and then add a key named NotebookId to AdditionalConfigs that has the value of the Athena notebook ID.

WorkGroupConfigurationUpdates.description: The configuration information that will be updated for this workgroup, which includes the location in Amazon S3 where query results are stored, the encryption option, if any, used for query results, whether the Amazon CloudWatch Metrics are enabled for the workgroup, whether the workgroup settings override the client-side settings, and the data usage limit for the amount of bytes scanned per query, if it is specified.
WorkGroupConfigurationUpdates.markdownDescription:
The configuration information that will be updated for this workgroup, which includes the location in Amazon S3 where query results are stored, the encryption option, if any, used for query results, whether the Amazon CloudWatch Metrics are enabled for the workgroup, whether the workgroup settings override the client-side settings, and the data usage limit for the amount of bytes scanned per query, if it is specified. 

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption
Read only property: Yes
